Html:
I have finished the tutorial till part 7 (admin rights for user) and i started to have few questions.

So far i dont have database i use datacontext yes? I wanted to change or add new categories by changing sample data but that didnt change anything. Do i still need sample data ? I changed the whole file and it didn change anything.

And how do i change existing data in the project ? Is there somewhere file that i can't see?

Thirdly is there a way to create database from clases? I have changed some names and i am wondering if there is some easy way to export database :)

cheers
nevermind .... the database was there all along but it was hidden - i had to add it manually to solution to see it and be able to work with it :P
Glad you found it. The database connection string is shown in the web.config / connectionString section.
